casebody.data:
Sorg Paper Company, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio et al., Appellants.

[Cite as Sorg Paper Co. v. Indus. Comm. (1990), 53 Ohio St. 3d 2.]

(No. 90-695 Submitted June 19, 1990 Decided July 25, 1990.) Dunlevey, Mahan & Furry, Gary W. Auman and Roselyn G. Ritchey, for appellee. Anthony J. Celebrezze, Jr., attorney general, and Gerald H. Waterman, for appellants.

The cause is reversed on authority of Wean Incorporated v. Indus. Comm. (1990), 52 Ohio St. 3d 266, 557 N.E. 2d 121.

Moyer, C.J., Sweeney, Holmes, Douglas, Wright, H. Brown and Resnick, JJ., concur.
